TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DrawingGroup extends System.Windows.Media.Drawing
Public NotInheritable Class DrawingGroup Inherits Drawing
public ref class DrawingGroup sealed : System::Windows::Media::Drawing

summary.span: 表示可以當成單一繪圖的繪圖集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of drawings that can be operated upon as a single drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用結合成單一的複合繪圖的多個圖形。Use a to combine multiple drawings into a single, composite drawing. 不同於其他物件，您可以套用， ，設定， ， ，或至。Unlike other objects, you can apply a , , setting, , , or a to a . 這個類別的彈性可讓您建立複雜的場景。The flexibility of this class enables you to create complex scenes. 因為也，它可以包含其他物件。Because is also a , it can contain other objects. 如需有關物件，請參閱[繪圖物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md). **可凍結的功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別提供數個特殊功能：可以宣告物件，因為在多個物件，變成唯讀，以改善之間共用效能考量，複製，而且進行安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Effects::BitmapEffect ^ BitmapEffect { System::Windows::Media::Effects::BitmapEffect ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Effects::BitmapEffect ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 以套用至這個 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to apply to this .
The to apply to this .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關點陣圖效果，以及如何運作的詳細資訊，請參閱[點陣圖效果概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md)。For more information about bitmap effects and how they work, see [Bitmap Effects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md). 作業會依下列順序套用： operations are applied in the following order: - - - - - ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何套用至繪圖。This example shows how to apply a to a drawing. 使用模糊或浮凸或套用至其他視覺效果呈現的內容。Use a to blur or emboss, or to apply other visual effects to rendered content. 只有物件支援的點陣圖效果。Only objects support bitmap effects. 若要將點陣圖效果套用至另一種物件、 將它加入並設定屬性物件。To apply a bitmap effect to another type of object, add it to a and set the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > Windows Presentation Foundation 點陣圖效果是軟體呈現。Windows Presentation Foundation bitmap effects are software rendered. 適用於任何物件也在軟體中呈現。Any object that applies a is also rendered in the software. 請避免使用在大型的視覺效果或動畫因為這種情況下可能會造成系統效能降低。Avoid using a in large visuals or animations because this scenario can cause a decrease in system performance. 下列範例會使用套用至數個物件。The following example uses a to apply a to several objects. 下圖顯示此範例的輸出。The following illustration shows the output from this example. ![具有 BlurBitmapEffect 的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "具有 BlurBitmapEffect 的 DrawingGroup")![DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupBitmapEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/BitmapEffectExample.cs#drawinggroupbitmapeffectexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupBitmapEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/BitmapEffectExample.xaml#drawinggroupbitmapeffectexamplewholepage)]

The default is .

The default is an empty .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的子項目疊置順序中的子系項目由決定的。The z-order of the child items in a is determined by the order of the child items in the of the . 每個子繪圖是在集合中的下一個子系之下。Each child drawing is under the next child in the collection. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ ClipGeometry { System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的裁剪區域。

span.span: Gets or sets the clip region of this .
The that is used to clip this .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從裁剪幾何外部的繪圖呈現時。Drawings outside the geometry are clipped from the when it is rendered. 幾何沒有是矩形。例如，您可以使用橢圓形的剪輯。The geometry does not have to be rectangular; for example, you can use an to clip to an elliptical shape. 作業會依下列順序套用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何定義的裁剪區域。This example shows how to define a clip region for a . 使用來定義的剪輯。Use a to define a clip for a . 類別是唯一的類型物件，可讓您定義您自己的裁剪區域。The class is the only type of object that enables you to define your own clip region. 使用來描述剪輯和套用，以便屬性物件。Use a to describe the clip and apply it to the property of the object. 下圖顯示之前和之後套用的橢圓形的剪輯。The illustration shows the before and after the elliptical clip is applied. ![定義之裁剪區域的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "定義之裁剪區域的 DrawingGroup")![DrawingGroup with a defined clip region](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "DrawingGroup with a defined clip region") 下列範例會使用套用至數個物件。The following example uses a to apply a to several objects. [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupClipGeometryExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/ClipExample.cs#drawinggroupclipgeometryexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupClipGeometryExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/ClipExample.xaml#drawinggroupclipgeometryexamplewholepage)]

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性仍會傳回 。

span.span: The property of the cloned object returns even if the property of the source is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀物件。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 當這個方法會複製相依性屬性時，會複製資源參考和資料繫結，即使它們可能不能再解析也一樣。When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings even though they might no longer resolve. 它不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。It does not copy animations or their current values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性仍為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀物件。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 這個方法不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個之後，會套用。The of this is applied after the . 如此一來，轉換的內容以及。As a result, the is transformed along with the contents of the . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of this .

value.span: 介於 0 與 1 之間的值 (含)，描述這個 的不透明度。

span.span: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that describes the opacity of this .
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為`1`指定完全不透明; 值為`0`指定它是完全透明。A value of `1` specifies that the is completely opaque; a value of `0` specifies that it is completely transparent. 值小於 0 會被視為 0，然後再為大於 1 的值，這個值視為 1。A value that is less than 0 is treated as 0, and a value that is larger than 1 is treated as 1. 另一種方式控制的不透明度是指定的其。Another way to control the opacity of a is to specify the of its . 作業會依下列順序套用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何修改的不透明度。This example shows how to modify the opacity of a . 類別是唯一的類型具有物件屬性。The class is the only type of object that has an property. 若要變更的不透明度物件、 將它加入並設定屬性物件。To change the opacity of a object, add it to a and set the property of the object. 設定物件乘以其子繪圖; 的不透明度比方說，如果具有0.5 和它包含有 50%不透明，筆刷為 25%不透明 (0.5 \* 0.5)。The setting of the object is multiplied by the opacity of its child drawings; for example, if a has an of 0.5 and it contains a that has a 50 percent opaque , the brush is 25 percent opaque (0.5 \* 0.5). 若要變更繪圖的選取部分的不透明度，使用。To alter the opacity of select portions of a drawing, use an . 下列範例會使用來結合數個物件。The following example uses a to combine several objects. 此範例也會設定的不透明度物件為 0.25，讓繪圖是 25%不透明。The example also sets the opacity of the object to 0.25 so that the drawings are 25 percent opaque. 下圖顯示之前和之後其設 0.25。This illustration shows the before and after its is set to 0.25. ![具有不同不透明度設定的 Drawinggroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "具有不同不透明度設定的 Drawinggroup")![DrawingGroups with different opacity settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "DrawingGroups with different opacity settings") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/OpacityExample.cs#drawinggroupopacityexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/OpacityExample.xaml#drawinggroupopacityexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ OpacityMask { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定筆刷，這個筆刷是用來更改這個 之選取區域的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush used to alter the opacity of select regions of this .

value.span: 描述這個 之不透明度的 ，而 表示沒有不透明度遮罩而且不透明度一致。

span.span: A that describes the opacity of this ; indicates that no opacity mask exists and the opacity is uniform.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至。The is mapped to the . 對應的每個像素的不透明度值用來決定產生的每個對應的像素的不透明度。The opacity value of each pixel of the mapped is used to determine the resulting opacity of each corresponding pixel of the . 只有每個色彩的筆刷的不透明度值用於這項處理。會忽略所有其他色彩資訊。Only the opacity value of each color in the brush is used for this processing; all other color information is ignored. 此屬性指定的不透明度乘以與值物件。The opacity that this property specifies is multiplied with the value of the object. 如需不透明度遮罩以及它們如何運作的詳細資訊，請參閱[不透明度遮罩概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md). 作業會依下列順序套用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何套用至的不透明度遮罩。This example shows how to apply an opacity mask to a . 類別是唯一的類型支援不透明遮罩的物件。The class is the only type of object that supports opacity masks. 若要套用至的不透明度遮罩物件、 將它加入並設定屬性物件。To apply an opacity mask to a object, add it to a and set the property of the object. 下圖顯示三個檢視的： 沒有不透明度遮罩，光是不透明遮罩的繪圖和套用的不透明度遮罩之後。The following illustration shows three views of the : the drawing without an opacity mask, the opacity mask alone, and the after the opacity mask is applied. ![不透明遮罩的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "的不透明度遮罩的 DrawingGroup")![A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask") 下列範例會使用的不透明度遮罩為。The following example uses a as an opacity mask for a . > [!NOTE] > 雖然這個範例會使用做為不透明度遮罩， ， ， ，和物件也可以讓良好的不透明度遮罩。Although this example uses a as an opacity mask, , , , and objects can also make good opacity masks. 如需不透明度遮罩以及它們如何運作的詳細資訊，請參閱[不透明度遮罩概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see the [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md). [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityMaskExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/OpacityMaskExample.cs#drawinggroupopacitymaskexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityMaskExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/OpacityMaskExample.xaml#drawinggroupopacitymaskexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至這個 的 。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將多個轉換套用至單一，使用。To apply multiple transforms to a single , use a . 作業會依下列順序套用： operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何套用至。This example shows how to apply a to a . 要轉換物件、 將它加入並設定屬性物件。To transform a object, you add it to a and set the property of the object. 類別是唯一的類型支援轉換的物件。The class is the only type of object that supports transforms. 若要將多個轉換套用至單一，使用。To apply multiple transforms to a single , use a . 下列範例會使用來結合數個物件，然後將它們轉換使用。The following example uses a to combine several objects and then transforms them by using a . 下圖顯示之前和之後套用。The illustration shows the before and after the is applied. ![A 旋轉 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "A 旋轉的 DrawingGroup")![A rotated DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "A rotated DrawingGroup") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupTransformExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/TransformExample.cs#drawinggrouptransformexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupTransformExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/TransformExample.xaml#drawinggrouptransformexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 識別 相依性屬性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
